name: The One Horseman
description:
A game made for Lame Jam 12.

To play, use A and D to move Left and Right, and W to shot

Art Assets : All Art used in this is made by me

Music : Arthur Vyncke - Cherry Metal

Sounds Used

> Warcraft 2 - Orc Death

> Space Coin Collect

> Exclamation of pain from a zombie

Fonts : Cloister Black
